metadata.title: CVE-2019-15224 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: The rest-client gem 1.6.10 through 1.6.13 for Ruby, as distributed onRubyGems.org, included a code-execution backdoor inserted by a third party.Versions <=1.6.9 and >=1.6.14 are unaffected.

criterions.comment: ruby-rest-client: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
